question.question: Which of the following characteristics is most indicative of a melanoma in the provided photograph?
question.option_a: A symmetric pigmented lesion with regular margins and uniform color
question.option_b: An asymmetric pigmented lesion with irregular margins, heterogeneously coloured, 18mm in diameter and recently changed
question.option_c: A small, flat mole with even pigmentation and smooth edges
question.option_d: A uniformly colored lesion that has not changed in size or shape over time
